name: Len'en Reiretsuden - Reactivate Majestical Imperial
summary: Len'en Reiretsuden ~ Reactivate Majestical Imperial (連縁霊烈傳 ～ Reactivate majestical imperial) is a vertical-scrolling danmaku shoot 'em up and the third game of the Len'en Project. It was made by Trick Nostalgie's sole member JynX and released for the Windows operating system.
